target: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
indicator_name: Number of deaths attributed to disasters per 100 000 population
national_indicator_available: 13.1.1.a. Number of deaths attributed to disasters per 100 000 population
computation_calculations: It is repeated from indicator 1.5.1.1. where the calculation formula and definition are presented
graph_title: 13.1.1.a. Number of deaths attributed to disasters per 100 000 population
source_data_source_1:
1) administrative data of the General Inspectorate for Emergency Situations
2) population statistics produced by NBS
source_data_supplier_1:
1.General Inspectorate for Emergency Situations
2.National Bureau of Statistics
source_organisation_1:
1.General Inspectorate for Emergency Situations (will provide the numerator)
2.National Bureau of Statistics (will calculate the final indicator)
comparison_global: The National Indicator represents a part of the Global Indicator
